title: Identify Niche and Content Strategy
description: Find a specific topic you are passionate about and can talk about endlessly. Research your target audience and the existing competition. Plan your content format, style, and a consistent publishing schedule.
qualifications: A clear and specific content niche

title: Acquire Basic Equipment and Technical Skills
description: Start with basic, affordable equipment: a decent smartphone or camera for video, a USB microphone for audio. Learn the fundamentals of recording, lighting (for video), and editing. The focus is on clean audio and clear visuals.
qualifications: Ability to produce decent quality content

title: Launch and Consistent Content Creation
description: Launch your channel/podcast and stick to your schedule. The first 50-100 episodes/videos are about practice, finding your voice, and improving your craft. Focus on creating value and don't worry about numbers initially. Engage with every comment.

title: Audience Growth and Monetization
description: Once you have a consistent output and an engaged community, focus on growth. Collaborate with other creators, promote your content on social media, and analyze your analytics to see what works. Monetize through ads, small brand deals, and affiliate marketing.

title: Build a Media Brand and Business
description: Treat your channel/podcast as a business. Diversify your income streams by selling merchandise, creating premium courses, or offering consulting services. You might hire an editor or a manager to help you scale your operations.
qualifications: An established and profitable media brand
